main event: Observers noted orange disc-shaped objects that appeared to come out of a cloud and moved behind a nearby cloud.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 16-20 minutes., The object was visible outside the clouds and appeared to roll back behind them., Witnesses described the object as metallic and emitting a brilliant red to orange light., The object was estimated to be about 40-50 feet in diameter and flew at an altitude of 500 to 1000 feet., One witness reported a contrail and cloud formation associated with the object.
witness description: The witnesses were civilians who observed the objects in the sky.
